questions.q: How is AI Visibility different from SEO?
questions.a: SEO optimizes for 10 blue links on Google. AI Visibility optimizes for the single answer generated by ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini. It requires a completely different strategy focused on brand entities and knowledge graph associations.

questions.q: Which AI models do you track?
questions.a: We track all major LLMs including GPT-4 (ChatGPT), Claude 3, Gemini (Google), Perplexity, and Llama 3.

questions.q: How long does it take to see results?
questions.a: Unlike SEO which can take months, AI models update their context windows and retrieval augmentation more frequently. Our clients typically see movement in sentiment and ranking within 4-6 weeks.

questions.q: Do I need technical skills to use Vyzz?
questions.a: Not at all. Vyzz is designed for marketers and business owners. We handle the complex prompt engineering and data analysis, giving you simple, actionable insights.
